item.title: DEFCON 30: Retrospective
item.description: Man. My team, Maple Bacon, collaborated with CMU’s CTF team PPP and Theori.io’s CTF team The Duck, forming Maple Mallard Magistrates as a merger to participate in DEF CON finals. The Beginning @PlaidCTF, @theori_io (The Duck), and @maplebaconctf are joining forces to play DEFCON as Maple Mallard Magistrates. Some PPP members also play on The Duck & Maple Bacon, so this allows all of us to keep playing on the same team.
